com.samsung.msf.mobilecontrol.view

Class VideoPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • RelativeLayout
      • com.samsung.msf.mobilecontrol.view.VideoPlayer

  • public class VideoPlayer
extends RelativeLayout
    Main application local video player. Handles videos, shows player controls that control video.
    Author:
    j.bielak
